div.a: Doctors Cure Child Born With HIV

div.div: Doctors in the US have made medical history by effectively curing a child born with HIV, the first time such a case has been documented.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/12mIb26&via=Digg&text=Doctors Cure Child Born With HIV

div.a: What Lies Beneath The Vatican

div.div: In 1950, LIFE reported on a years-long effort undertaken beneath the staggeringly ornate public realms of the Vatican, as teams of workers meticulously excavated the myriad tombs and other long-sealed, centuries-old chambers far underground.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Y7EGnM&via=Digg&text=What Lies Beneath The Vatican

div.a: This Is One Of The Craziest Buzzer-Beaters You Will Ever See

div.div: There really is no easy way to describe what happens in this video. Just watch it.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VXLlnK&via=Digg&text=This Is One Of The Craziest Buzzer-Beaters You Will Ever See

div.a: Watch 15,000 Volts Of Raw Power Burn Lightning Strikes Into Wood

div.div: When lightning flashes across the sky, you only get a chance to glimpse its fractal form for a split second. But when you send 15,000 volts coursing through plywood, you get a much better look at how it grows.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Xjps3m&via=Digg&text=Watch 15,000 Volts Of Raw Power Burn Lightning Strikes Into Wood

div.a: Israel Introduces 'Palestinian Only' Bus Lines

div.div: Afikim bus company to have special buses for Palestinian workers commuting from the West Bank to jobs in central Israel; announcement follows complaints from settlers that Palestinians are a security risk.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YiQiat&via=Digg&text=Israel Introduces 'Palestinian Only' Bus Lines

div.a: The Science Behind The Ocarina Of Time

div.div: One of the most critically acclaimed videogames of all time had a core mechanic that bends everyday physics. This clever game mechanic didn’t have to answer to the laws of physics in a world of fairies and magic. But amid the pots and potions, can we actually make scientific sense out of the past and future Hero of Time?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZZWc4g&via=Digg&text=The Science Behind The Ocarina Of Time

div.a: Even Google Can't Remember That The Samsung Chromebook Isn't A MacBook Air

div.div: Notice anything wrong with the Chromebook? Look closer.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WxqHIl&via=Digg&text=Even Google Can't Remember That The Samsung Chromebook Isn't A MacBook Air

div.a: Eerily Beautiful Photos Of The Polluted Gowanus Canal

div.div: The Gowanus Canal in Brooklyn is one of the country’s most contaminated waterways, laden with toxic chemicals dating back to 19th-century New York’s industrial areas. When Nietzsche talked about gazing into the abyss, he was really talking about the Gowanus. But if you take pictures of it in just the right light, it's actually reall pretty.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Yktpn1&via=Digg&text=Eerily Beautiful Photos Of The Polluted Gowanus Canal

div.a: Manned Mars Mission Plans Include A Radiation Shield Made Of Poop

div.div: The Inspiration Mars team plans to protect its astronauts from cosmic radiation by lining the spacecraft walls with water, food, and the astronauts' own feces.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Zb2vwY&via=Digg&text=Manned Mars Mission Plans Include A Radiation Shield Made Of Poop

div.div: WHOLE NEW MEANING TO 'DON'T TASE ME BRO'

div.a: This Guy Made A Taser Sword

div.div: Here's a double bladed sword with a taser built in!

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YY46Zg&via=Digg&text=This Guy Made A Taser Sword

div.a: A Map Of Television Show Locations In America

div.div: Graphic artist and physicist James Chapman has designed a detailed poster titled “AMERICA:the home of television” which is a map of television show locations in the United States.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13xeH0N&via=Digg&text=A Map Of Television Show Locations In America

div.a: What Titanic II Will Look Like

div.div: Here's what the Titanic II will look like inside and out.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/160SqrX&via=Digg&text=What Titanic II Will Look Like

div.a: Extended 'Game Of Thrones' Trailer

div.div: There's a few seconds of extra awesome in this extended version of the 'Game of Thrones' trailer that came out last week.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/ZOUnU6&via=Digg&text=Extended 'Game Of Thrones' Trailer

div.a: Man Fakes His Own Kidnapping To Explain Two-Week Absence To Girlfriend

div.div: A Brooklyn man faked his own kidnapping because he was terrified of his lover’s wrath.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VWq0Lw&via=Digg&text=Man Fakes His Own Kidnapping To Explain Two-Week Absence To Girlfriend

div.a: When Drug Cops Become Criminals

div.div: The war on drugs has become so intense that the line between criminality and law-enforcement has blurred. Salvador Martinez, an undercover officer at the Mexican border, ended up in prison after he went too far.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13tGTSd&via=Digg&text=When Drug Cops Become Criminals

div.a: 'It Kills Me' Not To Be President

div.div: Mitt Romney gave his first post-election interview to 'Fox News Sunday' today.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XAxG5O&via=Digg&text='It Kills Me' Not To Be President

div.a: Dennis Rodman's Bizarre Interview On His Visit To North Korea

div.div: In his first interview since returning to the U.S. from an unprecedented visit to North Korea last week, former NBA star Dennis Rodman said he bears a message for President Obama from the country’s oppressive leader, Kim Jong Un.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XLTuMJ&via=Digg&text=Dennis Rodman's Bizarre Interview On His Visit To North Korea

div.a: The Five Easiest Ways To Get Your Identity Stolen

div.div: Identity theft is a huge black market industry, costing US consumers $1.52 billion in 2011 and stealing headlines all last year. Here are five habits that all but guarantee you'll become just another statistic in 2013—and how to break them.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XhisE9&via=Digg&text=The Five Easiest Ways To Get Your Identity Stolen

div.a: The True-Life Horror That Inspired 'Moby-Dick'

div.div: A voyage that resulted in the accidental extinction of two species of animals and ended in a whale attack served as Herman Melville's inspiration for 'Moby-Dick.'

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YccNhm&via=Digg&text=The True-Life Horror That Inspired 'Moby-Dick'

div.a: Skiing Through A Forest Fire

div.div: Whistler, B.C.-based Switchback Entertainment is always pushing the envelope in their production of rad ski videos. Their newest video mixes fire and ice, creating the illusion of skiers slashing through a newly burnt forest.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/14dSVLq&via=Digg&text=Skiing Through A Forest Fire

div.div: NOT JUST GOD RUINING YOUR CHILDHOOD

div.a: Why Some People Get Zits And Others Don't

div.div: Scientists have discovered a new strain of acne bacteria that seems to protect skinfrom zits.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XAEvnN&via=Digg&text=Why Some People Get Zits And Others Don't

div.a: Everything You Need To Know About China's Cyber-Warriors

div.div: An ongoing campaign of computer attacks on the U.S. has been traced to China. What are the hackers after?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YjqXNC&via=Digg&text=Everything You Need To Know About China's Cyber-Warriors
